Themes

A Crotal theme directory is like this:

▾ appster/
        ▾ public/
                ▾ _asides/
                        about.html
                        friends.html
                        recent_comments.html
                        recent_post.html
                        social.html
                        twitter.html
                        weibo.html
                ▾ _comments/
                        disqus.html
                        duoshuo.html
                ▾ _layout/
                        base.html
                        get_more_posts.html
                        navbar.html
                        page.html
                        paginate.html
                        post.html
                        sidebar.html
        ▾ static/
                ▸ css/
                ▸ fonts/
                ▸ img/
                ▸ js/

A Crotal theme contains themes directories and files:

Name Description
public public folder contains the template html files.
static static folder contains the static files the theme needs, such as css, js, font, and images.
_asides The sidebar html files the theme may need.
_comments The comment system's embed code your can choose.
_layout Some basic html tempalte files the template engine may use to generate the site.

To know more about the template engine, please check Templates
